---
title: "PSI AIMS Special Interest Group"
---

The Application and Implementation of Medical Statistics (AIMS) 
Special Interest Group (SIG) objective is to support and contribute
to working groups researching the use of R in Pharma such as the R consortium
working groups (CSRMLW and RTRS), R validation Hub, other SIGs
(Data science/Visualization), PhUSE, Pharmaverse and Transcelerate and share
this information with the wider PSI community.
